Where Half-Life 3?

Not for the first time player, yet still fun if you take the time to learn. I recommend playing portal and portal 2 if you haven't played valve games before, this will make the experience more enjoyable if you are a first time player.  Despite the age of this game, I love how well it has aged. With the dystopian future of humanity told in a engaging way this is by far some of the best money I have spent on a game. Valve knows how to tell a story while still having engaging game play.
2022年的我游玩这款游戏时，她依旧令我在玩耍的过程中不断赞叹连连，HL2有惊奇的设计、幽默的剧情、印象深刻的人设（神父是真正的勇士！）、恰到好处的氛围。更令我欣喜的是她有中文配音！！而且配音质量非常棒，让我很好的沉浸在剧情当中。可想而知在将近二十年前HL2这款游戏是多么的惊艳世界，不亏是神奇的V社。

ВО! крутямбовая игруля)

Probably the best game Valve has made (excluding the Portal games). The episodes are fun, the combine outfits are really cool (especially the Nova Prospekt Guard outfit and the Overwatch Soldier outfit as well). My favourite chapters include: 5. Highway 17 because I like the whole coastal line aesthetic. 4. Follow Freeman! because I think that coming back to City 17 after the uprising and seeing the city in ruins is really cool to me. 3. Nova Prospekt although its the most disliked chapter in the community I like it because of the Broken down, barely running prison aesthetic. I also like the Prison Guards outfit. 2. Route Kanal its the first chapter where the action begins. I like how you get to the outskirts of the city before entering my favourite chapter. 1. Water Hazard this is my favourite chapter in the game because I like the feeling of hope you get as your entering the outskirts of City 17 and the feeling of accomplishment you get when destroying that damn Helicopter that won't get off of your ass. All and All, really good game and I recommend it with all of my heart.

慕名来玩这款神作，玩3.4个小时，有点难受，只能等缓缓再玩了。
主要就是这个游戏勾起了我不太好的回忆，直升机在上面追着我打我开游艇不知道路的时候，总感觉像是小时候我妈辅导我写作业让我选ABCD，我不知道哪个是正确答案，只能猜，我只要选错了或者是选慢了都得吃个大比斗，玩着玩着有点害怕，特别想哭，暂时玩不下去了。
